examples.example: 小朋友们对恐龙的世界充满了好奇和向往。

translate.english: Children are full of curiosity and longing for the world of dinosaurs.

examples.example: 恐龙虽然已经灭绝，但它们曾经在地球上留下了辉煌的历史足迹。

translate.english: Although dinosaurs have already become extinct, they once left glorious historical footprints on the earth.

examples.example: 小朋友在博物馆里兴奋地看着栩栩如生的恐龙化石。

translate.english: Children are looking excitedly at the vivid dinosaur fossils in the museum.
